__TOC__

==== Bluetooth ====

Bluetooth is becoming an evermore import technology.  Gnome integrates the majority of it's tools into the Bluetooth Applet and Gio/gvfs.  This enables connection and file sending to bluetooth devices.

'''Tests to perform'''

** Try and pair a device to your computer.
** Send a file from your computer to another device.
** Switch on file receiving and send a test file from your device to your computer.
** Connect to a paired device and try viewing file on the device.
** Try setting up a connection to a bluetooth audio device and run a test on Ekiga to see if it works.
